raw_text: ABHAYAPALA – MARGARET – nee GUNASKERA (Ex Bishop’s College Staff). Beloved wife of late P.D. (Nanda),​ loving mother of late Kanchana of Kalanie and Savanthi,​ Attorneys-at-Law,​ loved mother-in-law of Dr Kapila Silva and Channa Bakmiewewa,​ Attorney-at-Law,​ darling grandmother of Lakshika & Sachindra,​ Sahan & Anna and Shansa,​ beloved sister of Prins Gunasekara,​ Yasoma,​ Charles,​ Daisy,​ Dr P.B. (Cyril),​ P.P. (Patrick) and Augusta (all predeceased),​ passed away on 07th November. Funeral held on 08th. Phone : 0722852170,​ 0777720721.073478

BANDARA – THILAK (G.P.K.) former Manager of Grindlays Bank,​ Country Manager of Qantas Airways & Cox and Kings. Dearly beloved husband of Shani,​ loving father of Yohan,​ Tanya and Rajith,​ loving father-in-law of Keiko,​ Vinoth and Nushara,​ loving grandfather of Ashoka,​ Emeni,​ Mila,​ Amaya and Ellie,​ only son of late Mr & Mrs G.P.D. Bandara of Hettipola. Cortege leaves 182/​4 B,​ Sapumal Pedesa,​ off Stanley Tillekeratne Mawatha,​ Nugegoda at 2 p.m. for Cremation at Old Crematorium,​ Borella at 3 p.m. on Saturday 11th November 2023.072971

GOMES – PEARL WINNIFRED. Beloved daughter of the late Lucas and Mary Josephine Gomes,​ sister of the late Anton,​ late Bernard,​ late Felix,​ late Rev. Fr. John,​ late Stanley,​ late Aloysius,​ late Annesley,​ and of Leslie and Patrick Gomes,​ passed away peacefully on 8th November 2023. Much loved sister-in-law,​ aunty,​ grand aunty and great-grand aunty to many. Remains will lie at Barney Raymonds Funeral Parlour in Borella on Sunday,​ November 12th from 9.00 a.m. to 2.00 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 2 p.m. on the same day,​ for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic section).072990
